publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6911 Kenneth Gibson: Largs Has Got Talent—That the Parliament congratulates nine-year-old Becky Deveney on winning the Largs Has Got Talent grand final at a packed and atmospheric Barrfields Pavilion Theatre on Friday 3 September 2010 with her powerful rendition of Valerie; is aware that more than 60 acts auditioned for the contest with 13 reaching the grand final, and acknowledges what it considers to be the high standard of competition and the hard work of Largs Youth Theatre on producing the show in such a professional way and in providing weekly drama workshops for nearly 200 young people. Supported by: John Lamont*, Aileen Campbell*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*, Stewart Maxwell*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-6911 Largs Has Got Talent (lodged on 6 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-6911 Kenneth Gibson: Largs Has Got Talent—That the Parliament congratulates nine-year-old Becky Deveney on winning the Largs Has Got Talent grand final at a packed and atmospheric Barrfields Pavilion Theatre on Friday 3 September 2010 with her powerful rendition of Valerie; is aware that more than 60 acts auditioned for the contest with 13 reaching the grand final, and acknowledges what it considers to be the high standard of competition and the hard work of Largs Youth Theatre on producing the show in such a professional way and in providing weekly drama workshops for nearly 200 young people. Supported by: John Lamont, Aileen Campbell, Stuart McMillan, Sandra White, Stewart Maxwell, Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Gil Paterson
